page.title: 19HOME LIFE - MAUREEN'S STORY
page.content: My name is Maureen O'Donnell, I live at Langlands Rd. I am 10 years old. I live with my mum and dad, I have 2 sisters and a brother. Their names are Tracy, Susan and Kevin. We live in a flat of a tenement building. There are 63 steep stairs. I hate climbing up them but I love comming down. There are 2 sets of bunkbeds in our room. We have red and blue wallpaper to match our curtains. We have quilt covers on our beds, they are very warm at night. I get Â£2.50{pocket_money}a week from my dad. my mum does not work and sometimes can't afford to give us {pocket_money.} My mum saved up a long time to spend all our money on carpets and furniture.
